title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - Answering Questions from the BTeam Facebook Group with Everyone! (Week of 3/8)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - Answering Questions from the BTeam Facebook Group with Everyone! (Week of 3/8)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan2 brings on Lunchbox Eddie, Scuba Steve, Mike D & Abby to answer questions from the BTeam Facebook group. She also talks to Amy about her daughter's audition and Lunchbox and Mike D to talk about how the idea for "Will It Pizza?" came to be this week!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
